channel.title: TGaceAllStories
channel.description: This is a randomly ordered feed of the most recent entries from TGaceAllStories, skipping any feeds with errors.

item.title: Bank of Japan’s Ueda rattles global bond markets with the prospect of a rate hike this month
item.description: A stronger yen and rising Japanese bond yields could pull capital away from the U.S. equity and bond markets.

item.title: Will bitcoin keep dropping? Why this technical analyst is eyeing a turnaround as soon as Tuesday.
item.description: Technical analysis suggests bitcoin could be set for a short-term reversal as early as Tuesday, signaling the recent decline may be approaching its en...

item.title: Here’s a new way to shave hundreds of dollars off your tax bill — but it might make you feel like Scrooge on Giving Tuesday
item.description: Some people have an incentive to hold off on charitable giving until next year, in order to get the full tax reward for their generosity when new rule...

item.title: My friend cosigned a loan for a BMW, but the driver defaulted. They’re both on the hook for $5K. What happens now?
item.description: “The driver thinks he should be compensated $1,500 for the tires he’s still paying for.”

item.title: ‘She’ll let him live there for free’: My sister wants to buy our impoverished brother’s house. Is that a bad idea?
item.description: “Her only concern is that it will show up as an asset or rental property on her end.”

item.title: Holiday shopping season kicks off with a solid start. Here are the big winners
item.description: Omnichannel retailers and a couple of beauty names look to be the biggest beneficiaries of Black Friday spending this year, according to analysts.

item.title: Medical device stocks have formed a 'cup-and-handle' chart pattern. What that means for the group
item.description: Katie Stockton of Fairlead Strategies goes through the IHI ETF's technical patterns.

item.title: NYSE insider Jay Woods on the stocks to watch this week, including a retail turnaround story
item.description: Jay Woods gives Pro subscribers the rundown on the week ahead from the NYSE.

item.title: New Fortress Energy: From Distress to Dominance – The Turnaround Thesis in LNG Infrastructure
item.description: New Fortress Energy Inc. (NASDAQ: NFE), a pioneer in integrated gas-to-power infrastructure, has endured a brutal year. Shares have plummeted over 90%...

item.title: Josh Brown bought this tech stock when he was a retail broker decades ago. Now it's back on his radar
item.description: Josh and Sean revisit their Morgan Stanley play and also give two new names on the Best Stocks list.

item.title: This stock tied to U.S. housing could be in trouble. How to make money on potential declines through options
